analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nakusalaṁ nosaññojanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo saññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kusalam no saññojanam dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ saññojanaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Nakusalaṁ noganthaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kusalam no gantham dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ ganthaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nakusalaṁ nooghaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo ogho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kusalam no ogham dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ oghaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nakusalaṁ noyogaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo yogo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kusalam no yogam dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ yogaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nakusalaṁ nonīvaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo nīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kusalam no nīvaraṇam dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ nīvaraṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nakusalaṁ noparāmāsaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo parāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kusalam na uparāmāsam dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ parāmāsaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
